title.rendered: Perth vs Hobart, Australian T20 League, 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Perth: Stephen Eskinazi, Cameron Bancroft, Aaron Hardie, Josh Inglis (wk), Ashton Turner (c), Nick Hobson, Ashton Agar, Andrew Tye, Matthew Kelly, Jason Behrendorff, Peter Hatzoglou/David Payne

Hobart: Caleb Jewell, Ben McDermott, Matthew Wade (c & wk), Zak Crawley, Tim David, Asif Ali, Faheem Ashraf, Tom Andrews, Patrick Dooley, Nathan Ellis, Riley Meredith

Venue: Optus Stadium, Perth

Pitch Report

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 149

2nd innings average score: 157

Wickets per innings: 6

Type: Helps the seamers

Wins

Batting 1st: —

Batting 2nd: 100%

Also Read:

India vs New Zealand, 2nd ODI, 2023: Fantasy Team

Fantasy Tips of The Day

When these sides met earlier in the competition, Josh Inglis and Patrick Dooley were the captain and vice-captain of the Ultimate Team respectively.

Before taking a break in the last game, Mathew Kelly became the only player from Perth to feature in the Ultimate Team for 4 games in a row this season. 

Andrew Tye loves bowling at Perth. He has bagged 29 wickets, including the best figures of 4 for 20 in 17 attempts.

Meanwhile, Ashton Turner has enjoyed batting here. His recent scores at the venue read 48*, 53, 61, and 23*.

For the past few seasons against Perth, Ben McDermott has been dismissed for a single-digit score on 5 out of 6 occasions.

In the last 3 games at Perth, 74% of the wickets fell to the seamers and 13% belonged to the spinners.

Although the seamers have enjoyed the conditions at the Optus Stadium, there is value for proper cricketing shots as well. 5 batters (top and middle order) have managed to register a fifty in the last 3 matches.
